title: Barbecued lamb ribs
description: These ribs can also be prepared in the oven. Follow the instructions as below, but 30 minutes in the oven, remove the foil and baste several times. Cook for about 1-1&frac12 hours, or until the meat is tender.
ingredients: 2 tbsp black peppercorns, crushed in a mortar and pestle
165ml/6fl oz maple syrup (or 6 tbsp brown sugar)
4-5 garlic cloves, crushed or pounded in a mortar and pestle
